languages.text: {n}Морда кибермастифа останавливается в волоске от лица рабочего. Медленно обнажая клыки, пес начинает угрожающе рычать и внезапно лязгает челюстью.{/n}
{n}The cyber-mastiff's muzzle stops a mere hair's breadth away from the worker's face. Baring his fangs slowly, Glaito lets out a menacing growl, before his jaws abruptly snap shut.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Морда кибермастифа останавливается в волоске от лица рабочего. Медленно обнажая клыки, пес начинает угрожающе рычать и внезапно лязгает челюстью.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The cyber-mastiff's muzzle stops a hair's breadth away from the worker's face. Slowly baring his fangs, Glaito begins to growl menacingly, then suddenly snaps his jaws.{/n}
{n}The cyber-mastiff's muzzle stops a hair's breadth away from the worker's face. Slowly baring his fangs, Glaito begins to growl menacingly, then suddenly snaps his jaws.{/n}
{n}The cyber-mastiff's muzzle stops a mere hair's breadth away from the worker's face. Baring his fangs slowly, Glaito lets out a menacing growl, before his jaws abruptly snap shut.{/n}

{n}The cyber-mastiff's muzzle stops a mere hair's breadth away from the worker's face. Baring his fangs slowly, Glaito lets out a menacing growl, before his jaws abruptly snap shut.{/n}

languages.text: {n}格雷托向前走了几步，停住了脚步，口套距那个工人的脸只有一根头发丝的距离。它慢慢露出尖牙，发出了充满威胁的咆哮，随后猛地合上了嘴巴。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cyber-mastiff's muzzle stops a mere hair's breadth away from the worker's face. Baring his fangs slowly, Glaito lets out a menacing growl, before his jaws abruptly snap shut.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}格雷托向前走了几步，停住了脚步，口套距那个工人的脸只有一根头发丝的距离。它慢慢露出尖牙，发出了充满威胁的咆哮，随后猛地合上了嘴巴。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El hocico del cibermastín se detiene a un pelo del rostro del trabajador. Glaito deja escapar un gruñido amenazador, mostrando los dientes, antes de cerrar súbitamente las fauces.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cyber-mastiff's muzzle stops a mere hair's breadth away from the worker's face. Baring his fangs slowly, Glaito lets out a menacing growl, before his jaws abruptly snap shut.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El hocico del cibermastín se detiene a un pelo del rostro del trabajador. Glaito deja escapar un gruñido amenazador, mostrando los dientes, antes de cerrar súbitamente las fauces.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La truffe du cyber-mastiff s'arrête à un cheveu du visage de l'ouvrier. Retroussant lentement ses babines, il émet un grognement menaçant avant de faire claquer sa mâchoire.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cyber-mastiff's muzzle stops a mere hair's breadth away from the worker's face. Baring his fangs slowly, Glaito lets out a menacing growl, before his jaws abruptly snap shut.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La truffe du cyber-mastiff s'arrête à un cheveu du visage de l'ouvrier. Retroussant lentement ses babines, il émet un grognement menaçant avant de faire claquer sa mâchoire.{/n}

languages.text: {n}サイバーマスチフの鼻面は、労働者の顔すれすれの距離で止まった。グライトはゆっくりと牙をむき出しにし、不気味な唸り声を上げると、その顎を突然パチンと閉じた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cyber-mastiff's muzzle stops a mere hair's breadth away from the worker's face. Baring his fangs slowly, Glaito lets out a menacing growl, before his jaws abruptly snap shut.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}サイバーマスチフの鼻面は、労働者の顔すれすれの距離で止まった。グライトはゆっくりと牙をむき出しにし、不気味な唸り声を上げると、その顎を突然パチンと閉じた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Siber mastifin namlusu, işçinin yüzüne milim mesafede duruyor. Dişlerini yavaşça gösteren Glaito, tehditkâr bir hırıltı çıkarıp sonrasında aniden çenesini kapatıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cyber-mastiff's muzzle stops a mere hair's breadth away from the worker's face. Baring his fangs slowly, Glaito lets out a menacing growl, before his jaws abruptly snap shut.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Siber mastifin namlusu, işçinin yüzüne milim mesafede duruyor. Dişlerini yavaşça gösteren Glaito, tehditkâr bir hırıltı çıkarıyor ve ardından aniden çenesini kapatıyor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Schnauze des Cyber-Mastiffs hält eine Haaresbreite vor dem Gesicht des Arbeiters inne. Glaito entblößt langsam seine Zähne und knurrt bedrohlich, dann schnappen seine Kiefer abrupt zu.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cyber-mastiff's muzzle stops a mere hair's breadth away from the worker's face. Baring his fangs slowly, Glaito lets out a menacing growl, before his jaws abruptly snap shut.{/n}
